net.edzard.kinetic

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • net.edzard.kinetic.Node
        • net.edzard.kinetic.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, CustomShape, Ellipse, Image, Line, PathSVG, Polygon, Rectangle, RegularPolygon, Sprite, Star, Text, TextPath

    public abstract class Shape
extends Node
    Base class for all visible objects. Contains functionality for:
    • Mouse and touch position detection
    • Managing paint properties (stroke colour, width, fills, line joins, shadow)
    Author:
    Ed

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Shape.LineJoin
      Defines the way that to meeting lines are joined.
